Description:
NEST OR INVEST IN A LIFESTYLE LOCATION
ENTRY VIA LACEY STREET
Enjoying a northerly Lacey Street frontage, this dual-level apartment is a secure and significantly less-expensive alternative to a townhouse, appealing to investors and owner-occupiers alike.
Ground level entry reveals the light-filled and carpeted living/dining room, adjoining a fabulous kitchen featuring an integrated refrigerator and freezer, subway-tiled splashbacks, breakfast bench, a large pantry and quality Fisher & Paykel appliances, including a Ceran cooktop, electric oven and dish-drawer dishwasher. You’ll also benefit from direct access to a secure, gated car space from this level.
Upstairs, the 2 bedrooms are separated by a spacious bathroom with an integrated laundry. The main bedroom enjoys a wall of built-in robes and direct access to a large and private balcony, while the second bedroom faces north, overlooking the front balcony.
Blockout blinds and 2 split system units ensure year-round climate control, complementing great storage, a communal lawn area and intercom.
Currently tenanted at $330 per week, investors could invite the current tenants to remain or re-let the vacant property from early March 2019.
Amid supreme convenience, you can walk to a gym, shopping centres, medical facilities, cafes, restaurants, cinemas and bars. The convenience of the location is outstanding, being only a 5 minute walk to Croydon Station, Croydon Park and Croydon Pool, as well as nearby schools and easy access to EastLink.
